mapper.select: select id, username, password from shiro.im_user where username = #{value}

SELECT p.permission FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN t_role_permission rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN t_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{value};
